system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}

Benefits

When engaged in melee combat against a character that is using a psiblade or plasblade, the character gains a +3 bonus to all attacks made with their own psiblade or plasblade. When engaged in melee combat otherwise, the character gains a +2 bonus to all attacks made with their own psiblade or plasblade. Also, when using a psiblade to attack any object or armor that has plasma damage reduction, the damage given immediately goes into soak, even if it does not breach the object or armors damage reduction.

Special

Plasma damage that connects with Plasma damage reduction does not move to soak unless the damage is more than the damage reduction.
system.summary: +3/+2 To-Hit in melee, psiblades deal damage to shield soak
